items.title: Top 15 Model Context Protocol (MCP) Servers for Frontend Developers (2025)
items.excerpt: Model Context Protocol (MCP) has become the “USB-C” for agent/tool integrations, giving frontend teams a standard way to wire design specs, repos/PRs, deploy targets, observability, and work management into their editors and CI without bespoke adapters. This list focuses on pr…

items.title: Perplexity Launches an AI Email Assistant Agent for Gmail and Outlook, Aimed at Scheduling, Drafting, and Inbox Triage
items.excerpt: Perplexity introduced “ Email Assistant ,” an AI agent that plugs into Gmail and Outlook to draft replies in your voice, auto-label and prioritize messages, and coordinate meetings end-to-end (availability checks, time suggestions, and calendar invites). The feature is restric…

items.title: MIT Researchers Enhanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) 64x Better at Planning, Achieving 94% Accuracy
items.excerpt: Can a 8B-parameter language model produce provably valid multi-step plans instead of plausible guesses? MIT CSAIL researchers introduce PDDL-INSTRUCT , an instruction-tuning framework that couples logical chain-of-thought with external plan validation (VAL) to lift symbolic pl…

items.title: Microsoft Brings MCP to Azure Logic Apps (Standard) in Public Preview, Turning Connectors into Agent Tools
items.excerpt: Microsoft has released a public preview that enables Azure Logic Apps (Standard) to run as Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers , exposing Logic Apps workflows as agent tools discoverable and callable by MCP-capable clients (e.g., VS Code + Copilot).

items.title: LLM-as-a-Judge: Where Do Its Signals Break, When Do They Hold, and What Should “Evaluation” Mean?
items.excerpt: Most “correctness/faithfulness/completeness” rubrics are project-specific. Without task-grounded definitions, a scalar score can drift from business outcomes (e.g., “useful marketing post” vs. “high completeness”). Surveys of LLM-as-a-judge (LAJ) note that rubric ambiguity and…

items.title: IBM and ETH Zürich Researchers Unveil Analog Foundation Models to Tackle Noise in In-Memory AI Hardware

items.title: Building a Hybrid Rule-Based and Machine Learning Framework to Detect and Defend Against Jailbreak Prompts in LLM Systems
